channel.title: Music on dave
channel.description: Recent content in Music on dave

item.title: Flinging Spring
item.description: Got to play the WSSL stage at Spartanburg’s Spring Fling this year with The Social Contracts. If you haven’t heard TSC yet, make sure to check out the self-titled album from this past year. The city of Spartanburg was, of course, a gracious host and really knows how to put on a polished street fair. Our one-hour set: Mama Tried Sugaree Night Speaks to a Woman Dumb and Defeated A Woman Come and Gone
